description.en:
Gehl 125 from the Westby, WI map Buildings Pack Updated for FS22_Middleburgh to process Cracked Corn and Rolled Barley in small quantities.
The FS22_Gehl125_Westby mod is required for this mod to work - please download here and support the original modder: https://mb-farms.itch.io/fs22-westby-wi-4x-map
This mod will convert the following custom fill types on the Middleburgh, NY map by Nitrodad: 1L MAIZE to 1L CRACKEDCORN 1L BARLEY to 1L CRACKEDBARLEY
Respect to the original mod authors: JMF & Diniz Farms Thanks Mighty Mike Farms for the tutorial and idea: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iu08CES6GAU
